name: Ankit Kumar Jha
description: I am a B.tech student at IES college of technology, with a passion for programming and a strong desire to create user-friendly and developer-friendly projects. I have experience in a variety of programming languages including Python, JavaScript, HTML, CSS, and PHP, as well as frameworks such as React and Laravel. I am also proficient in tools like Docker, VSCode, and Git. I have completed an internship as a full-stack web developer and SEO specialist, where I successfully built an ERP system using Laravel and optimized a website for search engines. I am highly motivated and proactive, with strong project management skills. In addition to programming, I have a keen interest in physics and math and enjoy teaching others, particularly in the areas of competitive programming and computer science.
